7_1F8omDpXyPsBfd9CBJ91o4Wv1AA2KxqMEY.body: If your talking about bitcoin (I assume you are) then don't mine it. The more widespread it is, the less you get from mining. Instead play it like a stock, bitcoin is currently going through a bubble, it will most likely fall back to 1-3k in the next 2 months.
